document_data.name: Quicklimb
document_data.mainbody:
'''Quicklimb''' was a type of [[tree]] that grew in [[the Vast]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|20}}

Alongside shrubs and creepers, quicklimb saplings were quick to take root on the fieldstone and earthen walls around the farms in [[Maskyr's Eye]].
